page.title: 17EDUCATION IN WINGERWORTH
page.content: In our 4x3km area there are 3 primary schools:{Hunloke Park, Deer {Park and Tupton.} They all take children aged 4-11. At this age they transfer to {Tupton Hall School.} There are no state nurseries in our area, but many children go to private {play schools}or{play groups}before they are 4. There is a board of{governers}in charge of each school. They consist of 1 parent, 1 teacher, 6 Education Committe and 4 Parish Council members. It is their job, with the headmaster, to plan the organisation and the curriculum of the school. In the schools in our area the average class size for infants is 28, and juniors 33. Each school has 12 weeks holiday a year.
